body_html:
Thanks for your help and patience.

I have now tried to export the function in the image_ops namespace, as you said.

I'm still reluctant to install bazel and build tensorflow from source in case it breaks my working installation, because I'm currently not planning on making a lot of contributions to tf-core. So I'll see if I can get Jenkins to test it as well - I'm assuming it is a bot:

Jenkins, test this please.

(Reminds me of this :-) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MFqxdvggAxM

body:
Thanks for your help and patience.

I have now tried to export the function in the image_ops namespace, as you said.

I'm still reluctant to install bazel and build tensorflow from source in case it breaks my working installation, because I'm currently not planning on making a lot of contributions to tf-core. So I'll see if I can get Jenkins to test it as well - I'm assuming it is a bot:

Jenkins, test this please.

(Reminds me of this :-) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MFqxdvggAxM
